game_description: The #1 Place for VR Streamers! We're building Spectate to create a community for all AR/VR content creators. Spectate gives you a room in VR where your audience can watch your content together + you can talk with your audience from your laptop too! Email: spectate3D@gmail.com Twitter: @spectateVR TikTok: @spectateVR
review_1: the app is very good fun as you can meet up in the room and all watch the video together and you can chat live with the youtube creator during the live stream you can also react with sound effects.. i really enjoyed talking and not having to type messages.. i would recommend it. Great Fun
review_2: Really Fun And Nice To Play With Friends!
review_3: With the reference of the big screen, I did not find a benefit in this application, access to different environments? Nothing new, some motion sickness and 0 (zero) users in the app, maybe it's me, maybe I didn't understand how to do something simple like find users to interact with or maybe a lot of work ahead, good luck!
